Description.Name: Moloch
Description.Details:
Roy Moore is a stright-up brawler, both on and off the battlefield. Subtlety and strategy aren't lost on him, they're merely discarded as unwanted. He loves one-on-one competition both on and off the battlefield. Whether dueling, sparring, weight lifting, or (perhaps oddly) chess he pursues competition with a single-minded ferocity.

COMMANDER'S NOTE: Do not get him angry.
